post.body: I don't think my joints could handle that!
and @philrandolph it is supposed to be 17 F here for a low tomorrow high in 30s which does sound balmy
like I said I really am glad I don't live there!
thanks I just want him better so he can enjoy the holiday
@phigment and I want to try that place out!
Stayed home today cuz didn't get much sleep and have a Dr's appt at 3
Can't sleep, wish I had taken Advil PM or tylenol PM...Something PM, that would have knocked me out
Caden is snoring on my lap, he is just like his daddy
Am in a great place, caden is all snuggled against me watching tv and I think he is falling asleep, I love it
Am letting @phigment wrap while I drink a glass of wine
You all are making me appreciate where I live with all this talk about snow and ice
The wrapping paper I am using has grid marks on the back like graph paper and I still can't cut in a straight line
Ok my tolerance for dumb ass people who can't follow simple signs is about gone
Now if I can get out of this freaking parking lot!
Finally got kyle his drugs
Wandering around target waiting for the pharmacy to open back up
Thanks everyone we r getting antibiotics now
We have a winner! Kyle has strep
Waiting for kyle's quick strep test, wonder if I could buy some of these and do them myself at home :)
Leaving to take kyle to the pediatrician, wonder how long we will wait
